text: Stree ; is a Bengali television Soap Opera that premiered on December 26, 2016 and aired on Zee Bangla. It was produced by Snehasish Chakraborty and it stars Neha Amandeep and Abhijit (Neel) Bhattacharya in lead roles and Goutam De, Rita Koiral and Dolon Roy in supporting roles. It also stars Rahul Dev Bose and Madhurima Basak in a negative role. It replaced the popular show Goyenda Ginni. The show telecasted at Monday to Sunday at 7:30 pm.The Show went Off Air on 11 February 2018 and It Got replaced By Amloki. ==Plot== Niru is an innocent yet daredevil girl belonging to the not-so-privileged class of society. Niru has lived her life on her own terms taking all the responsibilities of her family on her own shoulders. Quite unaware of the complicacies of the human mind and the ways of the world, one day life brings her face to face with the most unexpected of circumstances. Her marriage is fixed and she waits to tie the knot with the ideal groom from an aristocratic family as per the wish of her family. He arrives, but on a wheel chair, to her utter shock and disbelief. It is found that this knowledge was kept away from her. The groom gives her the liberty to opt out of the marriage, Niru is left decide her own fate... to judge a human being between his being paralytic or on his just & generous nature. ==Cast== * Neha Amandeep as Nirupama / Niru (Main female lead) * Neel Bhattacharya as Prithwijit Deb/Aksar Sen (Main male lead) * Sanjib Sarkar as Niru's father * Rita Koiral as Sabitri / Niru's Mother (Deceased) * Moumita Gupta as Shakuntala * Goutam De as Indrajit Deb * Rahul Dev Bose as Vicky Deb (Main Antagonist) * Madhurima Basak as Rima Deb (Antagonist) *Gourav Ghoshal as Biju Deb * Priya Mondal as Aliya * Vikramjit Chowdhury as Rishi * Sananda Basak as Mukul's Wife * Aditya Roy as Mukul * Chandranibha Mukherjee as Goba * Dolon Roy as Namita * Ritu Rai Acharya as Nikki * Supriyo Dutta as Sumit Basu * Tapashi Roy Chowdhury as Rishi's Aunt *Meghna Mukherjee / Madhurima Paul as Toorsha/Rishi's Fianc√© (Now Running Role) *Sonali Chatterjee as Sonali Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2016 Indian television series debuts Category:2018 Indian television series endings
title: Stree (TV series)
